summary: A retired bachelor has a thing for his neighbor who only shows affection to her pet tortoise.
cast: James Corden|Salo Gardner|Dustin Hoffman|Richard Cordery|Judi Dench|Polly Kemp|Emily Ralph|Geoffrey McGivern|Jimmy Akingbola|Joseph West|Katie Lyons|Pik Sen Lim|Ronnie Hughes|Jack Honeyborne|Lisa Hammond|Anna Cannings|Leo Umeh|Lara Rossi|Pixie Davies|Harry Boyd|Alexander Bracq|Aaran Mitra|James Thomas Scott
title: Agu Trot de Roald Dahl
